page.title: 09Children's pastimes.
page.content: We asked the children at Escrick Primary School to compile a list of their favourite indoor and outdoor games.The most popular outdoor game is tig,followed by roller skating, rounders,leap frog,stuck in the mud and Blockey 1,2,3.It is interesting that nearly all of these games are traditional and can be played with little if any equipment.Favourite indoor games range from a variety of card games such as whist and patience to board games including chess, draughts,Cluedo and Scrabble.Favourite pastimes were very varied,but included making collections of things such as stickers,dolls and stamps,as well as more active pastimes such as horse riding,swimming and a wide range of sports.Playground games played include hop-scotch,skipping,and many kinds of chasing games.
